about_the_game:
This is free Soundtrack for
World of Art learn with Jigsaw Puzzles
Relax listening to these classical, hand-picked masterpieces by Chopin, Bach or Grieg on this free album.

13 Tracks perfect for Wolrld of Art Jigsaw Puzzles.
1 additional Track - Museum Ambient - Looped.

Enjoy!

Make sure to check the game here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1303670/World_of_Art__learn_with_Jigsaw_Puzzles/

If You have any suggestions and ideas, feel free to contact us.
